files.README.md:
# Stray Bits Sanctuary

A sanctuary for stray bits - plugins that wandered in and found purpose.

## Installation

Add this marketplace to Claude Code:

```bash
/plugin marketplace add github:noopz/stray-bits-sanctuary
```

## Available Plugins

| Plugin | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| [obsidian-shaper](https://github.com/noopz/obsidian-shaper) | Shape your Obsidian vault - create notes, search tags, analyze links, and manage frontmatter |

## Installing Plugins

```bash
/plugin install obsidian-shaper@stray-bits-sanctuary
```

## About

Visit [straybits.dev](https://straybits.dev) for more information.
